snippet: The United States and the 31 other teams in the 2014 World Cup will learn their first-round opponents on Friday when FIFA holds the draw in Brazil.
abstract: Sam Borden On Soccer column notes that the United States and the 31 other teams in the 2014 World Cup will learn their first-round opponents Dec 6, when FIFA holds draw in Brazil; tournament does not begin until June, but there is no denying that fortunes will be enhanced, or ruined, based on draw results.
lead_paragraph: The United States and the 31 other teams in the 2014 World Cup will learn their first-round opponents on Friday when FIFA holds the draw in Brazil.

headline.main: In Buildup to Brazil, Stirring the Pots Will Leave Some Coaches Shaken
headline.print_headline: In Buildup to Brazil, Stirring the Pots Will Leave Some Coaches Shaken
